name: Akshay Khanna

work_experience.title: Sr. Software Engineer
work_experience.description: Here is the updated work experience section of your resume, tailored to the Senior Frontend Developer role:

work_experience.title: Senior Consultant
work_experience.description: * Worked on the development and performance improvement of Atlassian's core UI design components in coordination with their Design System Team. Refactored and added features, contributed to their open-source libraries, and wrote code mods (AST JSCodeShift) for easy shipping of these components.* Built a complex distributed system for UK's leading Outdoor advertisement company. Developed multiple microservices and REST APIs using Golang, Java, Python, and MongoDB, following DDD to build them. Wrote multiple CRON jobs, handled concurrency (via routines) and managed the event-driven architecture using SNS & SQS. Built UI using React Redux and used linear programming (GLPK) to solve their inventory optimization problem. Written unit, integration, and contract tests for each microservice and followed TDD & pair programming.

work_experience.title: Product Developer
work_experience.description: As a Senior Frontend Developer, I have extensive experience in building user-friendly and scalable web applications using Angular 5+ and Java MVC (+ SQL) REST microservices. In my previous role at Tieto, I was part of the Healthcare Product development teams and worked on developing two apps from scratch.* Patient List & Task Management App:	+ Built the app from scratch using Angular 5+ and Java MVC (+ SQL) REST microservices	+ Developed user stories, wrote unit tests (jasmine + karma + jUnit), found bugs, and implemented suggestions and enhancements to the product	+ Gave demos after each sprint and attended/conducted grooming, swarming, and retrospective meetings with product OPO's* Other responsibilities included:	+ Collaborating with cross-functional teams (product managers, designers, and back-end developers) to deliver high-quality products on time	+ Staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in front-end development and suggesting improvements to existing processes and tools	+ Mentoring junior developers and providing technical guidance and support as needed.

work_experience.title: Software Engineer
work_experience.description: * Developed user stories and change requests as part of an agile Java backend development team for a Telecom Client Product.	+ Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements, and translated them into functional specifications.	+ Designed and implemented new features and improvements, working closely with the product manager and UX/UI designers to ensure alignment with the overall product vision.	+ Participated in daily stand-up meetings and helped the team stay on track with sprint goals and milestones.* Wrote multiple utilities and automation scripts to automate project infrastructure work and improve application stability. Some of these included:	+ Bot for Auto Incident Resolver on BMC IATM (Java & Sikuli lib): Developed a bot that automatically detected and resolved incidents in the product, improving incident resolution time and reducing manual effort.	+ Bot for clearing stalls (stuck processes): Created a bot that automatically identified and cleared stuck processes in the application, improving overall system stability and performance.	+ Auto Start/Stop Production Jobs & Server (C#, Background Worker): Developed a utility that automated the start/stop process of production jobs and servers, streamlining the process and reducing the likelihood of human error.	+ Server Log Management utility (C#, Ionic Zip lib): Created a utility that automatically managed server logs, providing real-time insights into system performance and identifying potential issues before they became critical.

skills: Skills for Senior Frontend Developer Role:* Languages: JavaScript, Python, Java, Go Lang, and C#* Database: MySQL, MS SQL, and MongoDB* Frameworks/Tools/Design Patterns: React JS, Redux, Angular 2+, Pact for contract testing, Servicenow, CSS in JS, Backend for the frontend, DDD, Open AI, LLM, Gen AI* Cloud/Devops: AWS, Azure, SNS, SQS, Rabbit MQ, Docker, CI/CD pipelines & Jenkins* Practices: TDD, Pair programming, XP, Test-Driven Development, Agile Methodologies, and cross-functional teams.* Data Structures, Algorithms, Distributed systems, Microservices, REST API, Design System & libraries, System Designing & Architecture Designing.
